Articles.Content:
Hello there!

I just started playing KSP about 2 weeks ago and I love it.

Actually I played it so much, that my girlfriend built secretly this little figurine of Bill while I was in university, to get back my attention

I hope you guys enjoy it as much as I do.

This... this is awesome

I've got something planned but I like this!

Rekilein, we will not believe that you do have a GirlFriend unless you post a picture of her holding (up) todays newspaper. {just kidding}

What are you studying ??

I can't read German, what does your 'to do' list say ??

Ich kann nicht lesen Deutsch, was Ihre "to do"-Liste sagen?

Edited January 24, 2014 by Lohan2008

Rekilein, we will not believe that you do have a GirlFriend unless you post a picture of her holding (up) todays newspaper. {just kidding}

What are you studying ??

I can't read German, what does your 'to do' list say ??

Ich kann nicht lesen Deutsch, was Ihre "to do"-Liste sagen?

Ich sprache kein Deustch

However, a quick type in Google Translate says (not perfect of course)

To-Do

-The work on the

(I couldn't get the second one, but I think it's about a website.)

(Either the third, though it may be game?)

(Or the fourth. God, I am bad at this.)
LOL, nice to know someone else tried the google translate.

Haha, thanks for all the nice words

Rekilein, we will not believe that you do have a GirlFriend unless you post a picture of her holding (up) todays newspaper. {just kidding}

What are you studying ??

I can't read German, what does your 'to do' list say ??

Ich kann nicht lesen Deutsch, was Ihre "to do"-Liste sagen?

Sadly I study medicine, not rocket science

Funny that you guys are so curious about my to do list

But heres the translation:

- Work on my dissertation (thesis)

- Sign up for Washabich.de in the 8. Semester (It's a website where students translate medical related results and findings into an for them understanable language)

- Yeah, Drakengard 3 is a Game I want to keep an eye on.

- Seitokai Yakuindomo is actually an Anime Series which name i always forgot

BTW: We are planning to make some more of these little Kerbals, so we have a team of about 3 or 4 with a little landing module

That's awesome! But yeah, if you have a girlfriend, you're not playing KSP enough.

Oh, and nice desktop background.
What is he made out of by the way?

What is he made out of by the way?

Oh, I'm not sure if you guys know that, we have here something called "Kinder Surprise", its a little chocolate Egg, and inside this egg there is a little plastic container (shaped like a kerbal's head) with a toy in it.

She took that plastic container, wrapped it with plaster and painted it. The eyes were made by using a LOT layers of white color.

The body is made completely out of wire, and the suit was some old piece of cloth she colored and sew to fit him.

Awwww! Your girlfriend is so great and loving that you should give her that attention: perhaps she'll be Mrs. Rekilein.

-Duxwing

Your girlfriend is so great and loving that you should give her that attention: perhaps she'll be Mrs. Rekilein.

And have a KSP themed wedding and then have two children named William (Bill) plus Robert (Bob), their dog's name can be Jeb <3

Thanks for sharing the artwork, please show us more pictures. {Google translate} Vielen Dank fÃƒÂ¼r das Kunstwerk, zeigen Sie uns weitere Bilder bitte.

Edited January 26, 2014 by Lohan2008

Allright guys.

We have been very busy this weekend, doing these:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Hope you guys enjoy!

I know some things there don't make sense (breathing on Mun, female Kerbal etc..)

PS: We are already together a looong time, there's no question I'll marry her. That'll will surely happen! But probably(!) we won't call our children like you guys suggested.

Artwork does NOT have to make sense, it is KSP ! I reckon that your GirlFriend could sell those Kerbal models on E-bay

How about Wernher ? After the German pioneer of rockets. http://history.msfc.nasa.gov/vonbraun/bio.html

Edited January 26, 2014 by Lohan2008

I like the girl kerbal. Is that a sonic screwdriver she's holding?

We have kinder surprise here, thats a pretty clever use for them.

Artwork does NOT have to make sense, it is KSP ! I reckon that your GirlFriend could sell those Kerbal models on E-bay

How about Wernher ? After the German pioneer of rockets. http://history.msfc.nasa.gov/vonbraun/bio.html

The quality of em isn't good enough to sell them, they are very sensitive

Wernher? I think the visual impression of the word is pretty weird.

And did any one think about what if it would be a girl?!

I like the girl kerbal. Is that a sonic screwdriver she's holding?

We have kinder surprise here, thats a pretty clever use for them.

Naah, that would be a cool idea actually.

So, even though it may disappoint you - It's just a plain pencil.

Tw1, I think you should build a Kerbal with a sonic screwdriver since you have kinder surprise

Why have you not wife'd her yet.

(There might be female Kerbals, maybe they all just work at home and we never see them!)

Why have you not wife'd her yet.

(There might be female Kerbals, maybe they all just work at home and we never see them!)

(Pssst, she's reading anonymously too..)
